1. Xpeng plans to hire 4,000 people, invest in AI as CEO warns intense EV rivalry may end in 'bloodbath'  CNBC
  2. China's EV rush into Western markets risks ending in a 'bloodbath' for the industry, warns founder of Tesla rival Xpeng  Fortune
  3. Chinese EV maker Xpeng unveils capex blitz as it sees no let-up in market bloodbath  Yahoo Finance
  4. Xpeng Spending Almost $500 Million This Year On Its Intelligent Cars  CarScoops
  5. Xpeng to boost workforce by 25, invest in AI driving tech  Automotive News Europe

item.title: AI can 'disproportionately' help defend against cybersecurity threats, Google CEO Sundar Pichai says - CNBC
item.description:
1. AI can 'disproportionately' help defend against cybersecurity threats, Google CEO Sundar Pichai says  CNBC
